file_content.text: I'm at the entrance to Megasecurity Ward 23. Status report.
Think we're ready here. You should be in a turbolift, meant for droids only. Scanners pick up active life signs, turbolift shuts down.
You need to use that carbonite trap we picked up. Freeze yourself solid, put yourself into hibernation. Chaney'll trigger the lift controls; only way in.
I'll check in with you once I'm inside.
I assume I don't stay a block of carbonite?
Modified the trap. Should unfreeze you on a timer.
I can see how your brother got himself killed. Things get easier after this?
Born from a carbonite womb, you enter my world. Welcome to Megasecurity Ward 23.
